entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 12:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
